Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer scored 74* (44) to lead India to a 7-wicket win with 17 balls remaining.
Post-Match Reflections: Shreyas Iyer was named the Player of the Match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala.
Others: The series was a 3-match series with India leading 2-0.
